heading: # Button groups
headingText: The `v-btn-toggle` component is a simple wrapper for `v-item-group` built specifically to work with `v-btn`.

usage.desc: Toggle buttons allow you to create a styled group of buttons that can selected or toggled under a single `v-model`

app-bar.heading: ### In toolbar
app-bar.desc: Easily integrate customized button solutions with a `v-toolbar`

qwerty.heading: ### Selected action
qwerty.desc: Group similar actions and design your own WYSIWYG component.

rounded.heading: ### Rounded buttons
rounded.desc: You can make `VBtnToggle` rounded using the `rounded` prop.

multiple.heading: ### Multiple
multiple.desc: `multiple` `VBtnToggle` allows user to select multiple variants and returns value as an array.

props.backgroundColor: Changes the background-color for the component.
props.dense: Reduces the button size and padding.
props.group: Generally used in [v-toolbar](/components/toolbars) and [v-app-bar](/components/app-bars). Removes background color, border and increases space between the buttons
props.shaped: Applies a large border radius on the top left and bottom right of the card.
